text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Dear sister, a few days ago, a person
who saw your painting entrusted me
with a message for you; "Would you
please consider displaying this in our
gallery?".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Umm…… They also said, "It's a wonderful
piece that brings to mind Ms. Ramonu's
love for the beauty of racing through
the vivid and delicate use of colors."

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: You don't agree with them, do you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Umm, I personally find that painting 
to be…… frightening.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text:
Whenever I see it…… my instincts 
overwhelm me, telling me it is dangerous 
here and urging me to run off.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: That is how it should be.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
That painting was me unleashing 
my emotions. My longing, ferocity, 
and "love" smeared across the canvas, 
mixed into the oils.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
It is not a piece to be handled by fools 
looking no deeper than the surface 
and going on about "love".

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text:
Well then. Please relay my 
answer to them verbatim.
